elements.title: Flexible Power
elements.description: Western Power Distribution, SP Energy Networks, Scottish and Southern Electricity Networks and Northern Powergrid have announced they are collaborating on 'Flexible Power' to signpost and operate all of their flexibility requirements. [In the news, Oct 2020](https://theenergyst.com/four-dnos-collaborate-to-streamline-flexibility-across-networks/)

elements.title: Kaluza
elements.description: Kaluza is OVO Groupâ€™s technology platform ecosystem that is driving the transition to a zero carbon grid. Its software platforms enable energy suppliers to empower their customers with unique digital experiences and smart, low carbon technologies
